snippet: FIFA, soccer’s world governing body, inserted itself into the dispute on Friday with a statement calling the Quebec federation’s ban on turbans inappropriate.
abstract: FIFA, governing body for international soccer, says Quebec Soccer Federation's ban on players wearing turbans is inappropriate and that such headwear is acceptable.
lead_paragraph: FIFA, soccer’s world governing body, inserted itself into the dispute on Friday with a statement calling the Quebec federation’s ban on turbans inappropriate.

headline.main: FIFA Seeks to End Quebec Soccer’s Ban on Turbans
